DOC.brief_summary: This multi-center , randomize , double-blinded , placebo-controlled study evaluate safety efficacy LIPO-202 reduction central abdominal bulging due subcutaneous fat non-obese subject .
DOC.brief_title: Evaluating Safety Efficacy LIPO-202 Reduction Central Abdominal Bulging Due Subcutaneous Fat
DOC.criteria: Healthy male nonpregnant female subject Capable provide write consent . BMI < 30 kg/m2 Stable diet exercise routine Central abdominal bulging evaluate clinician least slight bulge , flat Have treatment fat around abdomen , include surgical procedure ( tummy tuck , liposuction ) , injection fat loss treatment device reduce fat abdomen . Plan start weight loss exercise program study . Known hypersensitivity study drug
